title: Sword Magic - Magical Melee Combat Attacks
description: Unlock the full potential of your medieval fantasy melee combat with enchanting magic sword attacks!
longDescription:
Introducing our Sword Magic pack, a perfect complement to our flagship offerings like Sword and Savage Steel. This pack was crafted with the intention of infusing a touch of magical charm into your finishing moves! Included in this package are Power Ready sounds, designed to notify you when your special magic attack is primed and ready. To wield its power, simply initiate one of our Swings followed by a Magic Blade Slash to unleash a formidable magical melee attack. While some of our sounds feature subtle distinctions, they are crucial for creating a lifelike experience and preventing noticeable repetition in fast-paced combat scenarios.


* Explore our technical information section and SoundCloud previews to discover everything you need before making the exciting decision to add this pack to your collection!


SoundCloud Preview

Included Files List

We appreciate hearing from our buyers and value your feedback! Leaving a review, providing suggestions, or reaching out to us directly helps us understand your needs and preferences better. As authors, we genuinely enjoy interacting with the developers who use our product. 


Thank you,

Cyberwave Orchestra

cyberwaveorchestra@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 102

Number of Audio Cues: 102

Sample rate/bit rate: 16bit 44.100 Wav.

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 min and 10 sec

Supported Development Platforms: All


* Our focus has been on sound quality rather than quantity. Each sound effect features properly applied Fade-In and Fade-Out effects to ensure smooth and natural transitions. All sound effects are maintained below -1 dB to prevent audio overload when multiple sounds are triggered simultaneously. Our Swing sounds are perfectly synchronized, allowing any of them to seamlessly replace each other without the need for adjusting start times. This synchronization holds true for Blade Slash and Power Ready sounds as well. Our mission is to deliver high-quality sound that cuts through background music, immersing your players and sending shivers down their spines.
